original_title: My Friend and I Decided We Wanted to Become the World’s Best Minecraft YouTubers
overview: Famous Minecraft Youtubers, Dylan Stock (Sneaky Blockerzz) Tony Yang (Water Right) have a subscriber battle of life and death. This action packed film will keep you on the edge of your seat! Swords, Minecraft, and WAR are things that are not to be missed!
title: My Friend and I Decided We Wanted to Become the World’s Best Minecraft YouTubers
